Package marksmgmtcode

Class StudentManager

java.lang.Object
marksmgmtcode.StudentManager
class StudentManager extends Object
Manages the student records for the Marks Management application. This class handles operations such as adding, updating, and deleting student records.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentManager

      public StudentManager()
      Constructor for StudentManager. Initializes a list to hold student records.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student)
      Adds a student to the student list. Checks for duplicate entries based on student ID before adding.
      Parameters:
      student - The student object to be added.

    • findStudent

      public Student findStudent(String studentId)
      Finds a student in the list by their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to find.
      Returns:
      The found Student object or null if not found.

    • updateStudentName

      public void updateStudentName(String studentId, String newStudentName)
      Updates the name of a student identified by their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to update.
      newStudentName - The new name to be set.

    • updateStudentMarks

      public void updateStudentMarks(String studentId, double newProgrammingMarks, double newDatabaseMarks)
      Updates the marks of a student identified by their student ID for both subjects.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to update.
      newProgrammingMarks - The new marks for Programming Fundamentals.
      newDatabaseMarks - The new marks for Database Management System.

    • deleteStudent

      public void deleteStudent(String studentId)
      Deletes a student from the list based on their student ID.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student to delete.

    • getAllStudents

      public List<Student> getAllStudents()
      Gets the list of all students.
      Returns:
      List of students.

    • getBestStudentInProgrammingFundamentals

      public Student getBestStudentInProgrammingFundamentals()
      Finds the top student in Programming Fundamentals.
      Returns:
      The student with the highest marks in Programming Fundamentals.

    • getBestStudentInDatabaseManagementSystem

      public Student getBestStudentInDatabaseManagementSystem()
      Finds the top student in Database Management Systems.
      Returns:
      The student with the highest marks in Database Management Systems.
